description:
https://review.openstack.org/121491
commit 59d07f3956e77f426ace49b91d32e89da46dd274
Author: jichenjc <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Sep 11 20:19:04 2014 +0800

    Add notification for suspend
    
    There is no notifications for suspend when it's started, only
    notification at end of suspend. Change to notify at begin & end.
    
    DocImpact: Update SystemUsageData wiki.
    
    Co-Authored-By: Matt Riedemann <email address hidden>
    
    Change-Id: Ia689a1a66a871155faa0b841cff24ce036bf5015
title: Add notification for suspend
